title: Anyone here who studied information science in electronic City campus 2020 passout?

comments.body:
Do you mean Information Security (6th sem elective) or Information Science (the B.Tech branch)?

If you mean Information Science, I'm not sure if PESU has offered it before or has any plans on offering it. There might have been a branch when EC campus was still under VTU. 

If you mean Information Security, then go ahead. I took it last year.
How is the subject as a whole? The syllabus/assignments and exams?

Overall it was the highest scores elective for my batch. It's a theory + practical subject. It's fairly interesting and can be understood in class. If you don't understand ask doubts the teachers are ready to help. 

The syllabus is not that large honestly. 

The assignments are not too hard. They are honestly the most interesting and fun assignment to do out of all the subjects. 

Exams are easy overall. It was the highest scoring elective for my batch.
Yes, IS 2020 passout from PES South
